channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Roku is killing Photo Streams, ending personal pics as screensavers
item.description: Roku users will still be able to feature their favorite pics on their TV, but it's getting more complicated.

item.title: Digital artist Beeple put his face on a $100K robot dog next to Elon Musk and Picasso – it sold first
item.description: The project marks at least the second time Winkelmann has become the art world's main character.

item.title: Think phones are boring? Here are 4 reasons why 2025 was a big year for smartphones, and none of them are AI
item.description: Smartphones in 2025 are far from boring, with massive Apple redesigns, big competitive moves, and Google stealing iPhone features.

item.title: The Verge’s 2025 holiday gift guide
item.description: The holidays have a way of sneaking up on us. One minute you're trick-or-treating with your kids, and the next you're panic shopping in a Buc-ee's gift aisle. But it doesn't have to be that way. With the right cheat sheet, you can keep the holiday spirit high and stress levels low. Fortunately, we did […]
